trans-unit.source: Provides an editor control that enables end users to edit several layout-oriented user interface (UI) properties on an associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um controlo de editor que permite aos utilizadores finais editar várias propriedades de interface (IU) e orientado para o esquema de utilizador num associados <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The LayoutEditorPart class is an editor control that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class, and is used to edit properties that affect the layout of an associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: A classe de LayoutEditorPart é um controlo de editor que deriva a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>classe e é utilizado para editar as propriedades que afetam o esquema de uma associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Just as there are tool-oriented zones in the Web Parts control set (for details, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> class overview), there are tool-oriented part controls (tool parts), and each tool part must reside in a certain type of tool zone.
trans-unit.target: Tal como existem orientado para a ferramenta de zonas no conjunto de controlo de peças Web (para obter mais informações, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>Descrição geral de classe), existem controlos de peça orientado para a ferramenta (partes de ferramenta) e cada parte da ferramenta tem de residir num determinado tipo de zona de ferramenta.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>

trans-unit.source: Tool parts in the Web Parts control set have two distinguishing characteristics: - They are helper controls that enable end users to personalize controls on a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: Partes de ferramenta no conjunto de controlo de peças Web tem duas características distintivo:-são controlos de programa auxiliar que permitem que os utilizadores finais personalizar controlos numa página de peças Web.

trans-unit.source: - They are visible only in certain display modes.
trans-unit.target: -São visíveis apenas em determinados modos de apresentação.

trans-unit.source: The LayoutEditorPart control is a tool part that becomes visible only when a Web Parts page is in edit mode, and when a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control has been selected for editing.
trans-unit.target: O controlo de LayoutEditorPart é uma parte de ferramenta que fica visível apenas quando uma página de peças Web está em modo de edição e quando específico <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo foi selecionado para edição.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The LayoutEditorPart control, like all other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, resides in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> control.
trans-unit.target: O controlo de LayoutEditorPart, como todos os outros <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controla, reside num <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> zone can contain only <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls cannot be placed in any other type of zone.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>zona só pode conter <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlos, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlos não podem ser colocados em qualquer outro tipo de zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>

trans-unit.source: The LayoutEditorPart class has a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.Title%2A> property, which gets or sets the title for a layout control.
trans-unit.target: A classe de LayoutEditorPart tem um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.Title%2A>propriedade, o que obtém ou define o título de um controlo de esquema.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.Title%2A>

trans-unit.source: The class also has a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.Display%2A> property, which overrides the base property and returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: A classe também tem um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.Display%2A>propriedade, o que substitui a propriedade de base e devolve `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.Display%2A>

trans-unit.source: This means that the LayoutEditorPart control is always visible when the page is in edit mode, even if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A> property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control being edited is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Isto significa que o controlo de LayoutEditorPart sempre visível quando a página está no modo de edição, mesmo que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo a ser editado está definido como `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: In other words, users can always edit the properties in a LayoutEditorPart control, even if a specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control cannot be edited by the other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: Por outras palavras, os utilizadores podem sempre editar propriedades de um controlo de LayoutEditorPart, mesmo se uma determinada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo não pode ser editado por outros <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The LayoutEditorPart class also has two important methods, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>, which it inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class and overrides.
trans-unit.target: A classe de LayoutEditorPart também tem dois métodos importantes, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>, que esta herde do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>classe e substituições.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: The methods are critical because they enable getting and setting the property values between the field values of the editor control and the properties on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control being edited.
trans-unit.target: Os métodos são importantes porque permitem obter e definir os valores de propriedade entre os valores dos campos do controlo editor e as propriedades no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlar a ser editado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, the LayoutEditorPart control should be used in page persistence format by declaring an `<asp:layouteditorpart>` element inside a `<zonetemplate>` element, which is in turn contained by an `<asp:editorzone>` element on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Na maioria dos casos, o controlo de LayoutEditorPart deve ser utilizado no formato de persistência de página por declarar um `<asp:layouteditorpart>` elemento dentro de um `<zonetemplate>` elemento, que por sua vez está contido por um `<asp:editorzone>` elemento numa página Web.

trans-unit.source: The LayoutEditorPart control enables end users to edit the following UI properties of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A> To edit other properties and behavior of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, you can use the other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls supplied with the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: O controlo de LayoutEditorPart permite aos utilizadores finais editar as seguintes propriedades de IU de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A>para editar outras propriedades e o comportamento das <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlos, pode utilizar outros <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlos fornecidos com o conjunto de controlo de peças Web.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: These controls include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Estes controlos incluem o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>e o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The supplied <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls should provide most editing features required to edit <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, but you can also create a custom editor control by inheriting from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornecido <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlos devem fornecer a maioria das funcionalidades de edição necessárias para editar <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlos, mas também pode criar um controlo personalizado editor por herdar da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de código, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>Descrição geral de classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To improve accessibility, the LayoutEditorPart control is rendered within a `<fieldset>` element.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Para melhorar a acessibilidade, o controlo de LayoutEditorPart é composto dentro de um `<fieldset>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: The `<fieldset>` element groups the related set of controls used for editing in the LayoutEditorPart control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual user agents (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software).
trans-unit.target: O `<fieldset>` elemento agrupa o conjunto de controlos utilizados para edição no controlo LayoutEditorPart relacionado e facilita a navegação separadores entre esses controlos para os agentes de utilizador visual (por exemplo, comum browsers) e os agentes de utilizador e orientado para reconhecimento de voz (por exemplo, o software de leitura de ecrã).

trans-unit.source: Accessibility The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines.
trans-unit.target: Acessibilidade markup composto por predefinição para este controlo pode não em conformidade com normas de acessibilidade, tais como as diretrizes de prioridade 1 Web conteúdo acessibilidade diretrizes 1.0 (WCAG).

trans-unit.source: For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter detalhes sobre o suporte de acessibilidade para este controlo, consulte [controlos do ASP.NET e acessibilidade](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe.

trans-unit.source: The LayoutEditorPart constructor is a default; no constructor is declared in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> class and hence no special tasks are carried out when a new instance of the class is created.
trans-unit.target: O construtor de LayoutEditorPart é uma predefinição; não existe nenhum construtor é declarada no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>classe e tarefas especiais, por conseguinte, não são executadas quando é criada uma nova instância da classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Normally you do not need to use the constructor, because you can add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control to a page declaratively at design time.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, não é necessário utilizar o construtor, porque pode adicionar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>controlo a uma página de forma declarativa no momento da concepção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: However, if you need to add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control programmatically for some reason, you can use the LayoutEditorPart constructor.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se precisar de adicionar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>controlo através de programação, por algum motivo, pode utilizar o construtor de LayoutEditorPart.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Saves the values from a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart"></xref> control to the corresponding properties in the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Guarda os valores de uma <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart"> </xref> controlo para as propriedades correspondentes no associada <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method is a critical method on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: O método ApplyChanges é um método crítico num <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The method's purpose is to save the values a user has set on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control to the corresponding properties in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Objetivo do método é para guardar os valores de um utilizador definiu num <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>controlo para as propriedades correspondentes no associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The associated control is referenced in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control's inherited <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O controlo associado é referenciado no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>controlo do herdadas <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > You cannot call the ApplyChanges method from your own code.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Não é possível chamar o método ApplyChanges a partir do seu próprio código.

trans-unit.source: However, if you need more programmatic control over the process of editing various <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control properties than the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control provides, you can create a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control and provide your own implementation of this method.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se precisar de mais controlo programático sobre o processo de edição de vários <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlar propriedades que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>fornece controlo, pode criar um personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlar e fornecer a suas próprias implementação deste método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method attempts to set the following properties on the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A> The ApplyChanges method is called when the user clicks a button representing an OK or an apply verb in the editing user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: O método ApplyChanges tenta definir as seguintes propriedades no associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A>ApplyChanges o método denomina-se quando o utilizador clica num botão que representa um OK ou um verbo aplicar na interface de edição de utilizador (IU).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the action of saving values from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart"></xref> control to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control is successful; otherwise (if an error occurs), <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a ação de guardar valores do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart"> </xref> controlar para as <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlo for bem-sucedida; caso contrário (se ocorrer um erro), <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when setting the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState*> property on the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ocorreu um erro ao definir o valor de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState*>propriedade associada <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState*>

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base property inherited from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"></xref> control to hide the property from designers and prevent it from being affected by themes.
trans-unit.target: Substitui a propriedade base herdada de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"> </xref> controlo para ocultar a propriedade de designers e impedir que sejam afetados por temas.

trans-unit.source: Though it is public, this property is used for default rendering of this control and is not intended to be called from developer code.
trans-unit.target: Embora seja público, esta propriedade é utilizada para composição predefinida deste controlo e não se destina a ser chamado a partir do código do programador.

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não pode ser definida por temas ou temas de folha de estilo.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>e [temas ASP.NET e das máscaras de](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the ID of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref> control that receives the default focus in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que contém o ID de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"> </xref> controlo que recebe o foco de predefinição num <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a control should be displayed when its associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se um controlo deve ser apresentada quando associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlo está em modo de edição.

trans-unit.source: The Display property returns `true` even if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A> property is `false` on the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Devolve de propriedade apresentar `true` , mesmo que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A>propriedade é `false` no associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is so that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control can always be available in edit mode, even when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control cannot be edited by the other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: Isto é, para que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>controlo pode sempre estar disponíveis no modo de edição, mesmo quando um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo não pode ser editado por outros <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the control should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Um valor booleano que indica se o controlo deve ser apresentado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the property values from a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control and assigns them to the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os valores de propriedade de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlar e atribui-las para associada <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The SyncChanges method is a critical method on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: O método SyncChanges é um método crítico num <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: It implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> method from the base class, retrieves the current values from the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, and updates the child controls in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control with those values so a user can edit them.
trans-unit.target: Implementa o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>método da classe base, obtém os valores atuais de associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo, atualizações e controla o subordinado no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>controlo com esses valores para um utilizador pode editá-los.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SyncChanges method is called whenever the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control might have changed.
trans-unit.target: O método SyncChanges é chamado sempre que os valores existentes na associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo pode ter sido alterado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zone that contains the control calls the SyncChanges method immediately after calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method, so that the values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control are always synchronized with the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Para um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>controlo, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>zona que contém o controlo chama o método de SyncChanges imediatamente após chamar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>método, para que os valores existentes no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>controlo sempre estão sincronizados com os valores existentes na associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Another case where the SyncChanges method is called is when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is initially entering edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Outro cenário em que o método SyncChanges denomina-se é quando uma <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo inicialmente é introduzir o modo de edição.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a title for the editor control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um título para o controlo de editor.

trans-unit.source: The Title property value is displayed in the title bar of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control when the control is visible in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade de título é apresentado na barra de título de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>controlar quando o controlo está visível no modo de edição.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: When the control is declared in a page, you can set a value for the `Title` attribute.
trans-unit.target: Quando o controlo está declarado numa página, pode definir um valor para o `Title` atributo.

trans-unit.source: If you do not supply a value for the title, a culture-specific default value is used to describe the properties that this control allows users to edit.
trans-unit.target: Se não fornecer um valor para o título, é utilizado um valor específicas do idioma predefinido para descrever as propriedades que este controlo permite aos utilizadores editar.

trans-unit.source: A string that is used as the title of the control.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que é utilizada como o título do controlo.

trans-unit.source: The default value is a calculated control name supplied by the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é um nome de controlo calculada fornecido pelo conjunto de controlo de peças Web.
